solution_line_template: It cost him {bodyguard_hourly_rate}*{num_bodyguards}=${<<{bodyguard_hourly_rate}*{num_bodyguards}={cost_per_hour_both}>>}{cost_per_hour_both} an hour for both of them
That means he pays {cost_per_hour_both}*{hours_per_day}=${<<{cost_per_hour_both}*{hours_per_day}={cost_per_day}>>}{cost_per_day} a day
